title: Welcome to My Blog
excerpt: Starting a personal blog about AI coding techniques and building with frontier AI. First post: why I'm writing and what to expect.
content:
I'm starting this blog to share my experiences building with AI, coding techniques, and lessons learned shipping real products.

## What to Expect

- Monthly posts about AI-assisted development
- Case studies from building real products
- Honest takes on what works (and what doesn't)

Currently building [koucai.chat](https://koucai.chat) - a Chinese learning app.

## Why Now?

We're in the middle of a paradigm shift in how software gets built. AI coding tools like Claude Code, Cursor, and Copilot are fundamentally changing the developer workflow. I want to document what I learn as this space evolves.

## Topics I'll Cover

- **AI-assisted development**: Practical techniques for working with LLM coding assistants
- **Product engineering**: Building and shipping real applications
- **Developer tools**: Exploring new tools in the AI coding ecosystem
- **Lessons learned**: Honest reflections on what worked and what didn't

## More Posts Coming Soon

I have a backlog of topics I'm excited to write about:

1. How I built koucai.chat's spaced repetition system
2. Effective prompt engineering for code generation
3. The evolution of my development workflow with AI
4. Debugging strategies when AI-generated code fails

Thanks for reading! Check back soon for more posts.
